types:type.name: american_flights_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type american_flights_json = Array<{| ID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, code: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureDate: String, origin: String, destination: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, plane: {| "type": String, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"ID\\\":1,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"price\\\":400,\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2017\\/07\\/26\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"CLE\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"SFO\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":0,\\\"plane\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Boeing 737\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":150}},{\\\"ID\\\":2,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER45if\\\",\\\"price\\\":540.99,\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2017\\/07\\/27\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"SFO\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"ORD\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":54,\\\"plane\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Boeing 777\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":300}}]"}

types:type.name: american_flight_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type american_flight_json = {| ID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, code: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureDate: String, origin: String, destination: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, plane: {| "type": String, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} |} {"example": "{\\\"ID\\\":1,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"price\\\":400,\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2017\\/07\\/26\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"CLE\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"SFO\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":0,\\\"plane\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Boeing 737\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":150}}"}

%dw 2.0
type american_flight_No_Id_json = {| code: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureDate: String, origin: String, destination: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, plane: {| "type": String, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} |} {"example": "{\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"price\\\":400,\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2017\\/07\\/26\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"CLE\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"SFO\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":0,\\\"plane\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Boeing 737\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":150}}"}

%dw 2.0
type a_f_no_id_fields_names = {| code: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departure_date: String, origin: String, destination: String, empty_seats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, plane_type: String, plane_total_seats: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"price\\\":400,\\\"departure_date\\\":\\\"2017\\/07\\/26\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"CLE\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"SFO\\\",\\\"empty_seats\\\":0,\\\"plane_type\\\":\\\"Boeing 737\\\",\\\"plane_total_seats\\\":150}"}
